name: Strike Witches: Shirogane no Tsubasa
summary:
Cute kitty or puppy eared girls fly off to save the world. Choose three girls from the eleven witches, put strike units onto their feets and line them up for battle formation. Put them into different groups, there are more than 150 combinations, get to know the girls' strengths when you form teams, this is the key to victory.

To people who want to live the Strike Witch adventures, the story mode will take you beyond the end of the first season where there are new Neurois to shoot down. The seiyuu cast from the anime will be here to voice their respective characters, so there you go, pretty girls and adorable voices.
